block_comment: This block is a clock-triggered flip-flop that resets the 'syn_clk0_powerup_pll_locked' signal when a system reset is detected. The flip-flop performs the action at the rising edge of 'clk0_bufg' or 'sys_rst'. On the detection of a system reset ('sys_rst'), it clears the 'syn_clk0_powerup_pll_locked' signal. In the absence of a system reset, if the buffer PLL lock signal, 'bufpll_mcb_locked', is set, 'syn_clk0_powerup_pll_locked' is assigned TRUE.
